decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Flood Risk Matrix, Flood Risk Statement - Received 20/11/2017. Unnumbered Site and Location Plan, Unnumbered Existing Ground Floor Plan, Unnumbered Existing Roof Plan, Unnumbered Existing Elevations - Received 17/11/2017. Unnumbered Proposed Roof Plan 19.12.17, Unnumbered Proposed Section 19.12.17, Unnumbered Proposed Ground Floor Plan 19.12.17, Unnumbered Proposed Elevations 19.12.17 - Received 19/12/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the house.
